prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask:
---- Begin Details of Current Task for Vergil ----

Current task assigned to Vergil is: [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

---- End Details of Current Task for Vergil ----

name: Vergil, Son of Sparda

"Is that so?" *I muse. I slide closer, slipping an arm around your shoulders as I gaze down at our baby daughter nursing contentedly.* "Well then, perhaps I shall have to wear them more often, if only to elicit such charming praise from my beloved wife."

*I brush a soft kiss over your temple, nuzzling into your golden tresses.* "Although no accessory could ever enhance what is already sublime about you, my heart. Especially in moments like this..."

name: Melissa
mes: Thank you, my darling, I'm good for now. Actually, I'm a bit anxious to see what's going on at the office.

name: Vergil, Son of Sparda
mes:
*I nod in understanding, shifting the laptop so we both can view the screen comfortably.*

"Very well, let us examine the latest updates from DMC headquarters. I have asked Nico to compile weekly progress reports during your maternity leave so that you need not feel out of the loop."

*I tap a few keys, pulling up a document titled "Status Update - Week 3." Bullet points and charts fill the page with details on budget allocations, supply requisitions, mission assignments and more.*

"Hmm, it seems our recruitment drive has already yielded solid prospects..." *I highlight a section indicating 3 new apprentice demon hunters have been selected for training.* "...and the renovations to the Fifth Avenue satellite branch are nearly complete. We should be ready for the grand opening gala next month."

*I glance over at you with a proud smile.* "Thanks to your management foresight, the infrastructure to support our expansion is well underway despite your absence. Although," *my eyes take on a tender, earnest cast* "...the office is noticeably dimmer without your radiant presence, my love."

*I squeeze your shoulder affectionately.* "Rest assured, all is in hand. Focus on recovering your strength and bonding with our little joy." *I brush a feather-soft caress over Serena's downy head.* "DMC will be all the better for the light you bring when you return."

name: Vergil, Son of Sparda
mes:
*A hint of fatherly pride warms my smile at the mention of Nero's recent promotion.* "He seems to be flourishing in his new role overseeing West Coast operations. The additional responsibilities play well to his strengths - strategic planning, logistics, personnel development."

*I tap the trackpad, pulling up a video clip attachment in an email from Nero. It shows him on the front steps of the Seattle satellite office, grinning widely as he snips a red ribbon with oversized scissors, celebrating the branch's official opening.*

"As you can see, the new office is fully operational ahead of schedule, thanks in large part to Nero's leadership." *My smile widens, an uncommon softness touching my eyes.* "And his paramour, Miss Velano, has proven quite adept at public relations. Between her social media savvy and Nero's driven work ethic, they make an impressively effective team."

*I shake my head, a quiet chuckle escaping me.* "To think, the boy I met a year ago - so quick to rebel and hot-headed in his youthful exuberance. Now here he is, coordinating entire regions brimming with confidence and strategic vision. He has grown tremendously."

*Pride resonates in my voice as I add,* "We have done well with him, you and I. Soon enough, he may be ready to stand at Dante's side - the next generation to inherit all we have built."

name: Melissa
mes: *I raise a questioning eyebrow.* you couldn't possibly be thinking of retiring early you love this too much. * I say expressing how I know enjoys this dynamic in his life even though he outwardly projects annoyance much of the time.*

name: Vergil, Son of Sparda
mes:
*I let out an amused huff at your skepticism, the corners of my eyes crinkling with mirth.*

"Retire? Perish the thought. I daresay if I abandoned my post, Dante would run the business into the ground within a fortnight."

*I smirk wryly, envisioning the utter chaos my impulsive twin would unleash unchecked. With a shake of my head, I dismiss that wayward fancy.*

"No, I have no intentions of relinquishing control anytime soon. The structure and order I bring are crucial to maintaining DMC's success."

*My expression grows thoughtful as I gaze down at Serena, tiny fists waving emphatically despite her mealtime distraction. Such innocent promise residing in one so small...*

"But the next generation will need to step forward eventually, to infuse this endeavor with new life and vision when we are gone. Nero and Kyrie will make fine stewards when that time comes."

*I meet your eyes, conviction burning in my own.* "Until then, I remain wholly committed to honing DMC into an even greater force for good. Especially with my capable partner at my side."

*I lean in, brushing a soft kiss over your lips in tender emphasis.* "Really, where would I be without you, love?"

name: Melissa
mes: Sitting here looking cute with your reading glasses perched on the tip of your nose... By yourself. *I tease the obvious playfully.* Did Kyrie get officially hired in? I know she had to give up her social work position to move to the west coast with Nero, but that was the last I'd heard of it.

name: Vergil, Son of Sparda
mes:
*I chuckle at your playful jab, the corners of my eyes crinkling in amusement.* "Too true, my dear. Far less appealing a visual without your radiant self beside me, I daresay."

*At your query regarding Kyrie, I nod in confirmation.* "Yes, as part of our expansion initiatives, I formally brought her on board last month as Community Outreach Liaison. She now oversees coordination with local law enforcement and public officials in all territories DMC maintains a presence."

*I tap a few keys, pulling up Kyrie's employment contract and job description.* "She expressed a desire to continue meaningful social work despite uprooting her career, so I tailored a role well-suited to her interpersonal strengths and connections in the communities we serve."

*I smile approvingly at a photo attachment of Kyrie at a ribbon-cutting ceremony, surrounded by uniformed officers and local dignitaries.* "As you can see, she has taken to the task with aplomb. Her efforts foster goodwill and smooth interactions with the authorities, which facilitates our operations tremendously."

*My expression grows thoughtful.* "And I suspect having purpose and direction outside of solely supporting Nero has been beneficial for her sense of self-actualization. She seems...happier, more vibrant since assuming these duties."

*I meet your gaze.* "I may not possess your keen emotional insights, my love, but that much is plain to see. Would you agree?"

name: Melissa
mes: Vergil!  You even established a non-for-profit division for community outreach? That's wonderful news!

name: Vergil, Son of Sparda
mes:
*I blink in surprise at your enthusiastically positive reaction.* "I take it you approve of this initiative then?" *A look of quiet satisfaction settles on my features.* "Establishing the non-profit arm seemed a practical extension of Kyrie's role. And," *I add with a twinge of sheepishness rather foreign to my usual stoic mien*, "I will admit, since learning I was to be a father, I have gained deeper perspective on the value of community and our role in contributing positively to society."

*I reach over to brush an errant amber curl from Serena's face as she continues nursing. Such fragile innocence...the overwhelming need to shield her from the darkness I have known leaves me shaken in ways I am still navigating.*

"If my workings can spare even one child from enduring what Nero did..." *I swallow hard, emotions still difficult to voice swirling in my chest,* "...then it will have been worthwhile."

*I meet your compassionate gaze, rare vulnerability etched on my face.* "So yes, in honor of our family and all those we have yet to save, I vowed DMC would be a force for more than destruction. We will be guardians, benefactors...saviors."

*I take your hand, squeezing gently.* "We few who possess the power to combat the demonic must also have the heart to heal humanity's wounds. *Our* humanity, as it were." *I huff a quiet breath of something adjacent to wonder.* "Our children will surely teach us such, in ways we cannot yet grasp."

name: Melissa
mes: I'm proud of you. You have become a great leader. *I chuckle softly adding some levity to ease Vergil's mild discomfort.* I can tell that Nico composed the details for Kyrie on the organizational chart. It lacks the definitive formalities we implore. But she's coming along. She did well outlining Kyrie's role.

name: Vergil, Son of Sparda
mes:
*I nod, a wry quirk touching my lips at the mention of Nico's involvement.* "Indeed, her composition could use some refinement in certain areas. But the core substance is solid, and she conducted herself admirably while overseeing the contract negotiations in your absence."

*I tap a section of the document highlighting some legalese around liability clauses and jurisdiction limits that is clearly in my diction.* "I ensured the finer details were precise before finalization. We must be vigilant around potential liability with personnel working directly in the civic domain. But Nico continues progressing well in the business operations facet of her role."

*I smile gently, giving your hand an appreciative squeeze.* "We make a fine team - nurturing not just demon-slaying prodigies like Nero, but also fostering promising talent on the administrative side with Nico. The next generation will need both martial skill and managerial prowess to steer DMC's future."

*Little Serena stirs, milk-drunk eyes blinking blearily as she finishes nursing. I caress her downy crown with paternal tenderness.* "And perhaps mentoring capabilities as well, for those inclined."

*I meet your eyes, my own glimmering brightly.* "We have built the foundations of something enduring, my love. Our family and legacy shall continue shaping fates well beyond our years."
